# Annotated tree

The bundled `pL1000_tree_annot` is a rooted binary tree (200 cells) with
per-node confidence scores stored in `node.label`.

```{r}
data(pL1000_tree_annot)
data(pL1000_mut_dat)

plot_phylo_heatmap2(
    pL1000_tree_annot,
    pL1000_mut_dat,
    dot_size = 0.5,
    branch_width = 0.3,
    branch_length = FALSE,
    node_conf = TRUE,
    het_max = 1,
    title = 'Annotated tree'
)
```
